GSD.description:
ath11k: disable spectral scan during spectral deinit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 451b9076903a057b7b8d5b24dc84b3e436a1c743. For more details please see the references link.
